item.title: Chaire of Design Jean Prouvé
item.description: / Inaugural lecture / / Recent writings / La diversité dans l’enseignement du design et des métiers d’art doit faire école / Programmes / Master in design in residence at the Academia of climate in Paris / Teaching / Design research (DSN201) · Reflective practices (DSN202) · Digital skills for professional transition (TET007) / Events / Research seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design / Projects / Scuola del non sapere with Ruedi Baur and Civic City · TransFabriC at CNAM
